channel.title: Ice Cream by INDIR3CT [Trap]
channel.description:
Hey! It’s INDIR3CT! So...not too fond of the new way of posting tracks but...
Here is a new track I have been working on for a long long time. It was inspired by @aUstin_Haga’s song Fuse, and @IAATOE’s song Alien. I’ve been working really hard on many chords and automations to help make this song sound professional, unquie...and most importantly, fun!
https://soundcloud.com/indir3ct/ice-cream
Please take a listen, any comments, and feedback would be awesome.
I really worked hard on this and would love your honest opinion; I was debating wether or not I should start putting my music on ITunes and Spotify. Please if you listen to the song, use this poll to help me decide :smiley: it would help a bunch!!
Should I start putting tracks (starting with this one) on ITunes, Spotify, Etc.? [poll type=regular public=true] * Yes * No [/poll]
Thanks so much for your help everyone!
and remember.... #IceCream4Life

Hey! It’s INDIR3CT! So…not too fond of the new way of posting tracks but…

Here is a new track I have been working on for a long long time. It was inspired by @aUstin_Haga’s song Fuse, and @IAATOE’s song Alien. I’ve been working really hard on many chords and automations to help make this song sound professional, unquie…and most importantly, fun!
